resources.string: COURSE MATERIAL TO BE ADDED SOON
Ready to squeeze some brain juice!!!
Instructions on how to use the LogiKit

A logic value, 0 or 1, is often called a binary digit, or a bit. If an application requires more than two discrete values, more bits may be used, with a set o n bits representing 2 to the power of n different values
A logic circuit whose outputs depend only on its current inputs is called a combinational circuit
